name: pkgwide-str:theme_name
desc: optional name of theme

name: pkgwide-str:print_engine
desc: string indicating the default print engine

name: pkgwide-fn:pvalue_fun
desc: function to style p-values throughout package

name: pkgwide-fn:prependpvalue_fun
desc: function to style p-values throughout package that include a "p" prefix, e.g. "p<0.001" or "p=0.12"

name: pkgwide-lgl:quiet
desc: logical indicating whether to suppress messages or not

name: pkgwide-str:language
desc: string indicating language

name: as_gt-lst:addl_cmds
desc: list expression of gt-package commands inserted in the `as_gt()` call. Do not include the `data=` argument. Expression is inserted after the named call, e.g. after "tab_spanner" in the example.

name: as_flextable.gtsummary-lst:addl_cmds
desc: list of expressions of flextable-package commands inserted in the `as_flextable()` call. Do not include the `data=` argument. Expression is inserted after the named call, e.g. after "autofit" in the example.

name: as_kable_extra-lst:addl_cmds
desc: list expression of kableExtra-package commands inserted in the `as_kable_extra()` call. Do not include the `data=` argument. Expression is inserted after the named call.

name: tbl_summary-fn:percent_fun
desc: function to style percentages

name: tbl_summary-fn:N_fun
desc: function to style integers

name: tbl_summary-str:continuous_stat
desc: glue string defining the default continuous summary statistics to display

name: tbl_summary-str:categorical_stat
desc: glue string defining the default categorical and dichotomous summary statistics to display

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.continuous_by2
desc: default test for continuous variables with a 2-level by variable

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.continuous
desc: default test for continuous variables with a 3- or more level by variable

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.categorical
desc: default test for categorical/dichotomous variables

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.categorical.low_count
desc: default test for categorical/dichotomous variables with minimum expected count <5

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.categorical.group_by2
desc: default test for categorical/dichotomous grouped/correlated variables with a 2-level by variable

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.continuous.group_by2
desc: default test for continuous grouped/correlated variables with a 2-level by variable

name: tbl_regression-str:coef_header
desc: string setting the default term for the beta coefficient column header

name: add_global_p-str:type
desc: set argument default for `add_global_p.tbl_regression(type=)` and `add_global_p.tbl_uvregression(type=)`
